attributes.action: Solve the Banking Crisis, without the use of Tax Payers money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Claw back the bonuses paid to the Fat Cats in the City  =  £17 Billion.
Seize the Pension Funds of the Fat Cats, estimated at over £133 Billion.
Keep them in their jobs - but pay them the National Minimum Wage - NO bonuses - NO Pensions (other than Old Age Pension).
Give this some serious thought - this would solve ALL our problems......and could even secure your position as our "Most Noble Prime Minister".

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
